arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
transliteration: Bismillahi walajna, wa bismillahi kharajna, wa ‘ala Rabbina tawakkalna
english: In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ ٱلسَّلَامُ وَمِنْكَ ٱلسَّلَامُ تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا ٱلْجَلَالِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ
transliteration: Allahumma anta as-salam wa minka as-salam tabarakta ya dhal-jalali wal-ikram
english: O Allah, You are Peace, and from You comes peace. Blessed are You, O Possessor of majesty and honor.

arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَىٰ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ
transliteration: Bismillah, tawakkaltu ‘ala Allah, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
english: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.

arabic: حَسْبِيَ ٱللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
transliteration: Hasbiyallahu la ilaha illa Huwa ‘alayhi tawakkaltu wa Huwa Rabbul ‘arshil ‘adheem
english: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no god but He. On Him I rely, and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.

arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَٰذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
transliteration: Alhamdulillahilladhi at‘amani hadha wa razaqanihi min ghayri hawlin minni wa la quwwah
english: All praise is due to Allah who has fed me this and provided it for me without any strength or power on my part.

arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
transliteration: Alhamdulillahilladhi ahyana ba‘da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushur
english: All praise is due to Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us, and to Him is the resurrection.

arabic: بِاسْمِكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
transliteration: Bismika Allahumma amutu wa ahya
english: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ ٱفْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
transliteration: Allahumma iftah li abwaba rahmatik
english: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka min fadlika
english: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ
transliteration: Bismillah
english: In the name of Allah.

arabic: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
transliteration: Ash-hadu an la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah, wa ash-hadu anna Muhammadan ‘abduhu wa rasuluh
english: I bear witness that there is no god but Allah alone, without any partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and Messenger.

when: Upon hearing the Adhan (call to prayer):
arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَٰذِهِ ٱلدَّعْوَةِ ٱلتَّامَّةِ وَٱلصَّلَاةِ ٱلْقَائِمَةِ آتِ مُحَمَّدًا ٱلْوَسِيلَةَ وَٱلْفَضِيلَةَ وَٱبْعَثْهُ مَقَامًا مَحْمُودًا ٱلَّذِي وَعَدْتَهُ
transliteration: Allahumma Rabba hadhihid-da‘watit-tammah, was-salatil-qa’imah, ati Muhammadan al-wasilah wal-fadilah, wab‘athhu maqaman mahmudan alladhi wa‘adtah
english: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and established prayer, grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the praised station You have promised him.

arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
transliteration: Alhamdulillah
english: All praise is due to Allah.

arabic: يَرْحَمُكَ ٱللَّهُ
transliteration: YarhamukAllah
english: May Allah have mercy on you.

arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي عَافَانِي مِمَّا ٱبْتَلَاكَ بِهِ وَفَضَّلَنِي عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِمَّنْ خَلَقَ تَفْضِيلًا
transliteration: Alhamdulillahilladhi ‘afani mimmabtalaka bihi wa faddalani ‘ala kathirin mimman khalaqa tafdila
english: All praise is due to Allah who has saved me from that which He tested you with and preferred me over much of His creation.

arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلتَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
transliteration: A‘udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq
english: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَٰذَا ٱلْبِرَّ وَٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَمِنَ ٱلْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَىٰ
transliteration: Allahumma inna nas’aluka fi safarina hadha al-birra wat-taqwa wa minal-‘amali ma tarda
english: O Allah, we ask You during this journey of ours for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that are pleasing to You.

arabic: آيِبُونَ تَائِبُونَ عَابِدُونَ لِرَبِّنَا حَامِدُونَ
transliteration: Ayibuna ta’ibuna ‘abiduna li-Rabbina hamidun
english: We return, repent, worship, and praise our Lord.

arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْحَيُّ ٱلْقَيُّومُ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
transliteration: Astaghfirullahalladhi la ilaha illa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyum wa atubu ilayh
english: I seek forgiveness from Allah, there is no god but He, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer, and I turn to Him in repentance.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ ٱلْخُبْثِ وَٱلْخَبَائِثِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba’ith
english: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from male and female devils.

arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ
transliteration: Ghufranak
english: I seek Your forgiveness.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ لَكَ صُمْتُ وَعَلَىٰ رِزْقِكَ أَفْطَرْتُ
transliteration: Allahumma laka sumtu wa ‘ala rizqika aftartu
english: O Allah, for You I have fasted, and with Your provision I break my fast.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ ٱنْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي
transliteration: Allahumma anfa‘ni bima ‘allamtani wa ‘allimni ma yanfa‘uni
english: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, and teach me what will benefit me.

arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ ٱلْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
transliteration: Asbahna wa asbahal-mulku lillahi wal-hamdu lillahi la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah
english: We have reached the morning, and the dominion belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah; there is no god but Allah, alone without any partner.

arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى ٱلْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
transliteration: Amsayna wa amsal-mulku lillahi wal-hamdu lillahi la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah
english: We have reached the evening, and the dominion belongs to Allah. All praise is due to Allah; there is no god but Allah, alone without any partner.

arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلتَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
transliteration: A‘udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min kulli shaytanin wa hammatin wa min kulli ‘aynin lammatin
english: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from every devil, poisonous creature, and every envious eye.

arabic: أَسْأَلُ ٱللَّهَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ رَبَّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
transliteration: As’alullahal-‘Adheema Rabbal-‘Arshil-‘Adheemi an yashfiyak
english: I ask Allah, the Mighty, Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.

arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لَا يَمُوتُ بِيَدِهِ ٱلْخَيْرُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu yuhyi wa yumitu wa huwa hayyun la yamutu biyadihil-khayru wa huwa ‘ala kulli shay’in qadir
english: There is no god but Allah, alone without any partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise. He gives life and causes death, and He is the Ever-Living who never dies. In His Hand is all good, and He is over all things capable.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ ٱلْخَوْفِ وَٱلْجُبْنِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika minal-khawfi wal-jubn
english: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from fear and cowardice.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَخِيرُكَ بِعِلْمِكَ وَأَسْتَقْدِرُكَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni astakhiruka bi‘ilmika wa astaqdiruka biqudratika wa as’aluka min fadlika al-‘adheem
english: O Allah, I seek Your guidance by Your knowledge and Your power by Your might, and I ask You from Your immense favor.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ صَيِّبًا نَافِعًا
transliteration: Allahumma sayyiban nafi‘an
english: O Allah, make it a beneficial rain.

arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلتَّامَّةِ مِنْ غَضَبِهِ وَعِقَابِهِ وَشَرِّ عِبَادِهِ وَمِنْ هَمَزَاتِ ٱلشَّيَاطِينِ وَأَنْ يَحْضُرُونَ
transliteration: A‘udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min ghadabihi wa ‘iqabihi wa sharri ‘ibadihi wa min hamazatish-shayateeni wa an yahdurun
english: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from His anger, His punishment, the evil of His servants, and from the whispers of devils and their presence.

arabic: رَبِّ ٱرْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرًا
transliteration: Rabbirhamhuma kama rabbayani sagheera
english: My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up when I was young.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ لَكَ ٱلْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
transliteration: Allahumma laka al-hamdu anta kasawtanihi as’aluka min khayrihi wa khayri ma suni‘a lah
english: O Allah, to You be praise, You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its good and the good for which it was made.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ أَدْخِلْهُ عَلَيْنَا بِٱلْأَمْنِ وَٱلْإِيمَانِ وَٱلسَّلَامَةِ وَٱلْإِسْلَامِ
transliteration: Allahumma adkhilhu ‘alayna bil-amni wal-imani was-salamati wal-Islam
english: O Allah, bring it upon us with security, faith, safety, and Islam.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ أَهِلَّهُ عَلَيْنَا بِٱلْيُمْنِ وَٱلْإِيمَانِ وَٱلسَّلَامَةِ وَٱلْإِسْلَامِ
transliteration: Allahumma ahillahu ‘alayna bilyumni wal-imani was-salamati wal-Islam
english: O Allah, let this moon appear to us with blessings, faith, safety, and Islam.

arabic: أَعُوذُ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَانِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ
transliteration: A‘udhu billahi minash-shaytanir-rajeem
english: I seek refuge in Allah from the accursed Satan.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ ٱلْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
transliteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja‘altahu sahlan wa anta taj‘alul-hazna idha shi’ta sahlan
english: O Allah, there is no ease except what You make easy, and You make difficulty easy when You will.

arabic: جَزَاكَ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرًا
transliteration: JazakAllahu khayran
english: May Allah reward you with goodness.

arabic: أُعِيذُكُمْ بِكَلِمَاتِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلتَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
transliteration: U‘eedhukum bikalimatillahit-tammati min kulli shaytanin wa hammatin wa min kulli ‘aynin lammatin
english: I seek refuge for you in the perfect words of Allah from every devil, poisonous creature, and every envious eye.

arabic: إِنْ شَاءَ ٱللَّهُ
transliteration: In sha’Allah
english: If Allah wills.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ يَسِّرْ وَلَا تُعَسِّرْ
transliteration: Allahumma yassir wala tu‘assir
english: O Allah, make it easy and do not make it difficult.

arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَالِقِينَ
transliteration: TabarakAllah ahsanul-khaliqeen
english: Blessed is Allah, the best of creators.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ ٱلنَّارِ وَعَذَابِ ٱلنَّارِ وَفِتْنَةِ ٱلْقَبْرِ وَعَذَابِ ٱلْقَبْرِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika min fitnatin-nari wa ‘adhabin-nari wa fitnatil-qabri wa ‘adhabil-qabr
english: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trial of the Fire, the punishment of the Fire, the trial of the grave, and the punishment of the grave.

arabic: ٱللَّهُمَّ ٱرْزُقْنِي رِزْقًا حَلَالًا طَيِّبًا
transliteration: Allahumma arzuqni rizqan halalan tayyiban
english: O Allah, grant me lawful and pure sustenance.

arabic: أَعُوذُ بِٱللَّهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ
transliteration: A‘udhu billahi wa qudratihi min sharri ma ajidu wa uhadhir
english: I seek refuge in Allah and His power from the evil of what I feel and fear.
